title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Certainly, Mr. Garrison.  You love the planetarium! To be without the planetarium causes you horrible pain! All you want to do is help the planetarium thrive! To not do so makes your stomach ache with needlelike stab-  and right over here we see the constellation Orion. Orion's belt is made up of three stars, one of which is actually a pulsar

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Dude, what just happened?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: What do you mean?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Come on, we've gotta get out of here before something bad happens.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Cheesy Poofs Call Backs Today! Cartman and his mom wait with the other finalists and their parents on sofas in the front office. Cartman is picking at his nose

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Don't pick your nose, hon.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I wasn't picking it-I had an itch, for cryin' out loud!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Don't be nervous. I'm sure you'll win.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I don't know. There's a lot of competition here.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Do you think I might win, Mommy?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I hope so, honey. Then perhaps we can eat for a little while.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Hey, look! They're giving away bread outside!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Did you hear that, Mommy?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Come on! Perhaps we can get some food in our stomachs!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Psych!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: The Planetarium. Stan and Kyle are standing outside. The doors open and the rest of the class straggles out

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: What the hell are you boys doing? You're supposed to be in there.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Mr. Garrison, we think that the planetarium guy is-

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Sshh!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Goodbye, children. Thanks for coming.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I wanna go again. I wanna go again!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh, for Pete's sake, Clyde. You just went!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Well, Clyde, if you like the plane'arium so much, perhaps you'd like to do some volumteer work here.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Yes. Yes, please!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Me, too!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Me, too! I wanna do it! I'd love to work here.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I'd like to tape the show!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Yeah, me tohohoo. Plahanehetaharium's gahahay!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Mr. Garrison?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Well, I guess I could give them extra credit for it.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Excellent! Why don't we step over here and I'll show all you children how to volunteer.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Hooray!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Dude, this isn't right.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Why?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: We're kids, dude. We don't volunteer for anything.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh, yeah.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Come on, we've gotta see what's going on in there.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Here's the control panel that operates all the stars.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Kenny, you go out there and tell us what you see.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: (Okay. Got to have some huggin')

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: He hits this switch-

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: (I don't see anything)

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: You see? Nothing, dude. Just a bunch of stars.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Yeah, I guess so.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: (Whoa, dude.)

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: What does that do?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I don't know.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Kenny! What's it doing?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: This says "maximum."  Oh my God, we've killed Kenny!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: We're bastards!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Dude, I told you something was up with this place!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: We've gotta go tell somebody, quick!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Casting Office. The finalists are showing their best work now

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: (clap clap clap)-G-O

ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Thank you uh, Peter. We'll let you know very soon.  Next will be uuh, Eric Theodore Cartman.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Hello, everybody.  Now, just do it like we rehearsed, hon.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I know, I know!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
role: She works hard for the money

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
role: # She works hard for the money, so you'd better treat her right
text: [he rips off his jacket and reveals a sky blue sequined vest and bowtie - and his belly button. The judges are surprised]

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
role: She works hard for the money

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
role: # She works hard for the money, so you'd better treat her right
text: [he moonwalks, then faces the judges again. End of performance]

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Well, Heric Cartman, that certainly was insane.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Thank you.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: We'll let you know.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Thank you.  Don't pick your nose, hon.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I'm not pickin' it ma! God damn it, I have a itch!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Jesus, where do we find these people?!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: South Park Elementary, the nurse's office

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Our minds are one. Mkay? Our thoughts are one. Mkay?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: This is the strangest thing I've ever seen!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Please, nurse, for a woman with a dead fetus on your head, you're not being very open-minded.  Open your mind to your counselor. Open your mind.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Dr. Adams.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Yes.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: He owns the planetarium. What about him?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: He uses the machine. The star machine.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Mkay?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: He uses it to erase minds.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: But why?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Planetarium, about to go out of business. Adams had to create slaves to survive.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: My God! This is amazing!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Abuh. Please, nurse, you're throwin' off my chi! Mkay?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Casting Office. The results are in

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Well, we'd certainly like to thank all our finalists. Only one of our finalists can win the grand prize and unfortunately, that finalist is Eric Cartman.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Yes! I'm the best!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: You were actually our last choice. Uh the other children have unexpectedly taken jobs as volunteers at the planetarium.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: That's odd.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Sweeet!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: News 4 Special Report

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: It appears that more and more South Park residents are discovering the wonder and joy of the planetarium. Here with a special report is a 34-year old Asian man who looks strikingly similar to Ricardo Montalban.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Thanks, Tom. Yes, indeed, the planetarium has become very popular as word spreads that it really isn't as lame and stupid as one suspected. I'm here with the planetarium operator, Dr. Adams.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Thank you. I'd like to open an invitation to all South Park residents to come see a special free show this evening. I guarantee, it will change the way you think about the plane'ah-arium

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: So, bring the whole family to the plane-tarium for a night of excitement and wonder.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Stan and Kyle are inside talking to Officer Barbrady

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: and then we turned the dial, and Kenny went into a kind of hypnosis.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: That's a pretty far-fetched story, boys.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: But it's true, dude!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Are you boys sure you're not just making this all up?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Yeah, pretty sure.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Well, just as soon as I handle all the other crime in South Park, I'm gonna go with you to the planetarium so I can prove that nothing's wrong.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: What other crime in South Park?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh, yeah. Let's go.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Time for Cartman's big debut

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Okay. Let's shoot the commercial. Where's our Cheesy Poof talent?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I'm over here.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oohh, you look great, hon. Mommy's fat little piggy.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Aay!  Let's hurry. This costume is hot.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Okay, roll camera, aaand action.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I love Cheesy Poofs, you-

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh wait, wait.  You've got a little eye booger, hon.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh, Mom, for Pete's sake!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Got it.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Aaand action.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I love Cheesy Poofs-

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Hold it! Cut! Could we get some more light on that backdrop?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Sure thing.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh, man, c'mon!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Got it.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Okay. Here we go, aaand action.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I love Cheesy Poofs, you love Chee-

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Cut!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: What?!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I'm not liking the shoes. Could we change the shoes?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh, God damnit!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Barbrady, Stan, and Kyle show up at the planetarium. Barbrady knocks and the door opens

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh. Hello, officer of the law.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Hello, Mr. Planetarium Operator.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: What brings you out here?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Well, these boys seem to think you're some kind of sick weirdo that's got a master plan to screw with the minds of everyone in town.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh, really?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Yeah. I just thought I'd come show them around so they'd know there's nothing to be scared of.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Actually, this is a pretty inopportune time.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Okay, I'll be quick, then.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Of coure, officer. Come on in.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Barbrady and the boys enter. What they see inside is something else. Kids, Bebe among them, are sweeping and cleaning the exhibits. Chef is helping out, too. All of them are wearing gray planetarium suits

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Hello, children.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh, no! They got Chef, too!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Welcome to the planetarium.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Well, it's nice to see you finally got a real job, Chef.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I love my work.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh I know what you mean. I've always loved the planetarium, too.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Would you like to see the stars, officer?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: No!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: That would be super-duper!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Don't do it, Officer Barbrady!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Cartman's house. He's calling everyone he knows

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Hello?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Hi, Grandma. It's me, Eric.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh, hello, Eric. Grandma sure has missed you.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: I just wanted to remind you that I'm gonna be on television tonight, so be sure to watch.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh, I will, Eric. You know, I remember when I was a little girl and had my first talent show audition for-

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Okay, bye.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Hello? The-uh Marshes aren't in right now. Please leave a message.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Stan? I'm gonna be on TV tonight. Be sure to watch.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Hello, you've reached the Broflovskis. Please, leave a message.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Where the hell is everybody?! I'm gonna be on TV tonight. You guys better not miss it!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Back at the planetarium

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: And this is the constellation called Cassiopeia

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh, neato!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: And now, officer, from this moment on, you will think that you are Elvis Presley.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Who?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: To not be Elvis will cause you great pain.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Pain.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: You see, children? There's no stopping me. Even your highly intelligent policemen are no match for me.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: He's not highly intelligent.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Why are you doing this, dude?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Why? Because nowadays kids have computers, surround-sound television. They've forgotten all about plane'ariums. But I'll make them remember, starting with the two of you!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Cartman's house. He's watching the TV for his commercial

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Terrance and Phillip will be right back after these announcements.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh, dude, here it comes!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Packed full of ingredients, Cheesy Poofs can really give you that quick pick-me-up. So remember

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
role: # I love Cheesy Poofs, you love Cheesy Poofs [the box opens and
text: Cheesy Poof pour out]

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
role: If we didn't eat Cheesy Poofs, we'd be-

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
role: # [the Cheesy Poofs rain down on a pile of Cheesy Poof in which
text: children swim]

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Lame.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: And now back to Terrance and Phillip.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Yes! Yes, that was me! I was on television!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Mr. Mackey and Nurse Gollum burst through the planetarium doors. Mr. Mackey is pissed. Facing them are Dr. Adams, Officer Barbrady, Stan, Kyle, and the two teens

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Aha! Caught you red-handed! Mkay!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Mr. Mackey!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Officer Barbrady, uh, this man is using some kind of mind control.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
role: Officer Barbrady	[doing a twisted Elvis Presley] Wuzzariah? Ulduhooyah?
text: Guh. Ahoohooyuh?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: What's wrong with him?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Ah-yeah, babe, yeah, babe

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
role: uhyeah hwah yeah hwah wayah ahowowowowayah

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh no, apparently, he thinks he's Charlton Heston.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: No, you idiot! He thinks he's Elvis. Elvis, escort our guests to the plane'arium.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Holdjit  If you wouldn't mind, uugh. Could you please follow me?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Uh oh.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Odle-oh who whoo?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: The planetarium, that night. Nurse Gollum, Mr. Mackey, Stan, and Kyle are strapped into their seats in the theater

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Well, let's begin, shall we?  And now you'll remember nothing, except that the planet'arium is the best thing you've ever known!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Well, well well! You guys can now kiss my ass, because I was on television! Ey! Didn't you guys see it?! I was on television!  You missed it! You missed it because of this stupid planetarium! Planetariums suck ass!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Aaah. Aaah. Aaah.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Cartman! You saved us!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: What the hell are you talking about?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Get over here and untie us!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Eric, you really saved the day. Mkay?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Not so fast there, tubby. Uh I'm just takin' care of business.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Think hard, Elvis. You're not really the king of rock and roll. You're a fat, stupid, worthless policeman in a small town. Mkay?

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh, thank you from a fate worse than death, counselor.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Oh my God! Dr. Adams!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Everyone rushes to the control room window to see what's happened. Dr. Adams is seated inside against a wall, slumped on his right side

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: He got a full dose of the stars.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Yeah. With nobody around to say anything.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Can you imagine it, Stan. A mind, emptied by that thing.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Wow. What a day this has been. I was on TV, and, I'm a hero.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: Don't pick your nose, hon.

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: God damnit, Mom, I wasn't pickin' it! I have an itch!

title: ROGER EBERT SHOULD LAY OFF THE FATTY FOODS
text: End of Roger Ebert Should Lay Off The Fatty Foods. The Cheesy Poofs anthem plays
